}} 'Collected' is a five disc Black 'N Blue box set, released in 2005, with 4
audio CDs and one DVD. This release contains the first four studio albums
released by the hard rock/ glam metal band, Black 'n Blue. The DVD contains an
entire live concert performed by Black 'n Blue, containing most of Black 'n
Blue's hits, while also including a few songs that were never released on any
Black 'n Blue disc. These include "Run Run", "Summer Heat", and "Rock n' Roll
Animals", which later became "Knocking On Heaven's Door".
